means: 删除（书等中的）令人反感的成分，修订，删去（不当处）( expurgate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: It was first published in 1914 in a highly expurgated version.
sentence.Network_cn: 它初版于1914年，当时删除了大量内容。

sentence.Network_en: The writer expurgated some parts from his novel when he read the third times.
sentence.Network_cn: 作家第三次审稿时又删去了几部分.

sentence.Network_en: He heavily expurgated the work in its second edition.
sentence.Network_cn: 在第二版中，他对书中内容进行了大幅删减。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... exhume 掘出，挖出 expurgate 净化；删去 ex-wife 前妻.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... purgative a 清洗的 expurgate v 订正，删除 unpurged a 未净化的.
神一般的SAT巴朗3500... ... 沉默寡言的： Taciturn/reticent/muted/retiring 删节： Expurgate/bowdlerize/abridge/prune/truncate.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... expunge 删除 expurgate 删除；使纯洁 exquisite 精致的；近乎完美的.

list.abs: I disapprove of expurgated aditions of Shakespeare ., 我不赞成莎士比亚作品的删改本.
express 快报expurgated edition 删节本，洁本expurgation 删改
express 快报expurgated edition 删节本，洁本expurgation 删改
expunge the class 注销船级expurgated bound 修正限expurgated code 删除码
expurgated bound 修正限expurgated code 删除码exquay 码头交货
沪江词库精选expurgated bound是什么意思、英语短语。expurgated bound怎么翻译: 修正限相关短语:  expurgated bound 修正限  expurgated code 删信码  expurgated.

entry.tran: 删去，删除（著作中有所冒犯或令人震惊之处）
entry.def: If someone expurgates a piece of writing, they remove parts of it before it is published because they think those parts will offend or shock people.

example.ex: He heavily expurgated the work in its second edition.
example.tran: 在第二版中，他对书中内容进行了大幅删减。

sentences.sentence: "at that time even Shakespeare was considered dangerous except in the expurgated versions"

auth_sentence.content: I actually think her literary executors, Diogenes, are publishing expurgated versions of her diaries probably in German first.
auth_sentence.res_content: I actually think her literary executors, Diogenes, are publishing expurgated versions of her diaries probably in German first.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I actually think her literary executors, Diogenes, are publishing expurgated versions of her diaries probably in German first.

auth_sentence.content: Why instead are they content with the publication - after Sir David Walker's evaluation of the material - of expurgated texts?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why instead are they content with the publication - after Sir David Walker's evaluation of the material - of expurgated texts?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why instead are they content with the publication - after Sir David Walker's evaluation of the material - of expurgated texts?
